speaker:
KING
               
              HENRY
text:
How
               
              yet
               
              resolves
               
              the
               
              Governor
               
              of
               
              the
               
              town
              ?

speaker:
KING
               
              HENRY
text:
This
               
              is
               
              the
               
              latest
               
              parle
               
              we
               
              will
               
              admit
              .

speaker:
KING
               
              HENRY
text:
Therefore
               
              to
               
              our
               
              best
               
              mercy
               
              give
               
              yourselves

speaker:
KING
               
              HENRY
text:
Or
              ,
               
              like
               
              to
               
              men
               
              proud
               
              of
               
              destruction
              ,

speaker:
KING
               
              HENRY
text:
Defy
               
              us
               
              to
               
              our
               
              worst
              .
               
              For
              ,
               
              as
               
              I
               
              am
               
              a
               
              soldier
              ,

speaker:
KING
               
              HENRY
text:
A
               
              name
               
              that
               
              in
               
              my
               
              thoughts
               
              becomes
               
              me
               
              best
              ,

speaker:
KING
               
              HENRY
text:
If
               
              I
               
              begin
               
              the
               
              batt’ry
               
              once
               
              again
              ,

speaker:
KING
               
              HENRY
text:
I
               
              will
               
              not
               
              leave
               
              the
               
              half-achieved
               
              Harfleur

speaker:
KING
               
              HENRY
text:
Till
               
              in
               
              her
               
              ashes
               
              she
               
              lie
               
              burièd
              .

speaker:
KING
               
              HENRY
text:
The
               
              gates
               
              of
               
              mercy
               
              shall
               
              be
               
              all
               
              shut
               
              up
              ,

speaker:
KING
               
              HENRY
text:
And
               
              the
               
              fleshed
               
              soldier
              ,
               
              rough
               
              and
               
              hard
               
              of
               
              heart
              ,

speaker:
KING
               
              HENRY
text:
In
               
              liberty
               
              of
               
              bloody
               
              hand
              ,
               
              shall
               
              range

speaker:
KING
               
              HENRY
text:
With
               
              conscience
               
              wide
               
              as
               
              hell
              ,
               
              mowing
               
              like
               
              grass

speaker:
KING
               
              HENRY
text:
Your
               
              fresh
               
              fair
               
              virgins
               
              and
               
              your
               
              flow’ring
               
              infants
              .

speaker:
KING
               
              HENRY
text:
What
               
              is
               
              it
               
              then
               
              to
               
              me
               
              if
               
              impious
               
              war
              ,

speaker:
KING
               
              HENRY
text:
Arrayed
               
              in
               
              flames
               
              like
               
              to
               
              the
               
              prince
               
              of
               
              fiends
              ,

speaker:
KING
               
              HENRY
text:
Do
               
              with
               
              his
               
              smirched
               
              complexion
               
              all
               
              fell
               
              feats

speaker:
KING
               
              HENRY
text:
Enlinked
               
              to
               
              waste
               
              and
               
              desolation
              ?

speaker:
KING
               
              HENRY
text:
What
               
              is
               
              ’t
               
              to
               
              me
              ,
               
              when
               
              you
               
              yourselves
               
              are
               
              cause
              ,

speaker:
KING
               
              HENRY
text:
If
               
              your
               
              pure
               
              maidens
               
              fall
               
              into
               
              the
               
              hand

speaker:
KING
               
              HENRY
text:
Of
               
              hot
               
              and
               
              forcing
               
              violation
              ?

speaker:
KING
               
              HENRY
text:
What
               
              rein
               
              can
               
              hold
               
              licentious
               
              wickedness

speaker:
KING
               
              HENRY
text:
When
               
              down
               
              the
               
              hill
               
              he
               
              holds
               
              his
               
              fierce
               
              career
              ?

speaker:
KING
               
              HENRY
text:
We
               
              may
               
              as
               
              bootless
               
              spend
               
              our
               
              vain
               
              command

speaker:
KING
               
              HENRY
text:
Upon
               
              th’
               
              enragèd
               
              soldiers
               
              in
               
              their
               
              spoil

speaker:
KING
               
              HENRY
text:
As
               
              send
               
              precepts
               
              to
               
              the
               
              Leviathan

speaker:
KING
               
              HENRY
text:
To
               
              come
               
              ashore
              .
               
              Therefore
              ,
               
              you
               
              men
               
              of
               
              Harfleur
              ,

speaker:
KING
               
              HENRY
text:
Take
               
              pity
               
              of
               
              your
               
              town
               
              and
               
              of
               
              your
               
              people

speaker:
KING
               
              HENRY
text:
Whiles
               
              yet
               
              my
               
              soldiers
               
              are
               
              in
               
              my
               
              command
              ,

speaker:
KING
               
              HENRY
text:
Whiles
               
              yet
               
              the
               
              cool
               
              and
               
              temperate

              of

speaker:
KING
               
              HENRY
text:
O’erblows
               
              the

              and

KING
               
              HENRY
text:
Of
               
              heady

              ,

              ,
               
              and

              .

speaker:
KING
               
              HENRY
text:
If
               
              not
              ,
               
              why
              ,
               
              in
               
              a
               
              moment
               
              look
               
              to
               
              see

KING
               
              HENRY
text:
The
               
              blind
               
              and

              soldier
               
              with

              hand

              HENRY
text:
Desire
               
              the

              of
               
              your

              ,

speaker:
KING
               
              HENRY
text:
Your

              taken
               
              by
               
              the

              HENRY
text:
And
               
              their

              heads

              to

              ,

speaker:
KING
               
              HENRY

Your

speaker:

              HENRY

Whiles
               
              the
               
              mad
               
              mothers
               
              with
               
              their

              confused

speaker:
KING
               
              HENRY
text:
Do
               
              break
               
              the
               
              clouds
              ,
               
              as
               
              did
               
              the
               
              wives
               
              of

speaker:
KING
               
              HENRY
text:
At
               
              Herod’s
               
              bloody-hunting

              .

speaker:
KING
               
              HENRY
text:
What
               
              say
               
              you
              ?
               
              Will
               
              you
               
              yield
               
              and
               
              this
               
              avoid

speaker:
KING
               
              HENRY
text:
Or
              ,
               
              guilty
               
              in
               
              defense
              ,
               
              be
               
              thus
               
              destroyed
              ?

speaker: GOVERNOR
text:
Our
               
              expectation
               
              hath
               
              this
               
              day
               
              an
               
              end
              .

speaker: GOVERNOR
text:
The
               
              Dauphin
              ,
               
              whom
               
              of
               
              succors
               
              we
               
              entreated
              ,

speaker: GOVERNOR
text:
Returns
               
              us
               
              that
               
              his
               
              powers
               
              are
               
              yet
               
              not
               
              ready

speaker: GOVERNOR
text:
To
               
              raise
               
              so
               
              great
               
              a
               
              siege
              .
               
              Therefore
              ,
               
              great
               
              king
              ,

speaker: GOVERNOR
text:
We
               
              yield
               
              our
               
              town
               
              and
               
              lives
               
              to
               
              thy
               
              soft
               
              mercy
              .

text:
Enter
               
              our

              ,
               
              dispose
               
              of
               
              us

              ours
              ,

text:
For
               
              we
               
              no

              HENRY
text:
Open
               
              your

speaker:
KING
               
              HENRY
text:
Come
              ,
               
              uncle

              HENRY

              HENRY
text:
And

              the

              .

speaker:
KING
               
              HENRY
text:
Use
               
              mercy
               
              to
               
              them
               
              all
               
              for
               
              us
              ,
               
              dear
               
              uncle
              .

speaker:
KING
               
              HENRY
text:
The
               
              winter
               
              coming
               
              on
               
              and
               
              sickness
               
              growing

              HENRY

Upon

              soldiers

KING
               
              HENRY
text:
Tonight

              HENRY

              for
